subject: Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Television
lead_paragraph: Gary Cohen, the Mets’ SNY announcer, has had to alter his approach to calling home runs thanks to the four video reviews of disputed homers that have gone in favor of the Mets since Saturday.
snippet: Gary Cohen, the Mets’ SNY announcer, has had to alter his approach to calling home runs thanks to the four video reviews of disputed homers that have gone in favor of the Mets since Saturday.
